alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; Tensas; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 8:28PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A mixture of freezing rain, sleet, and snow through tonight. Additional ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch, and snow and sleet accumulations up to one half inch. Additionally, very cold wind chills values as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Arkansas, northeast Louisiana, and much of northern, central, and southwestern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel is likely to be severely impacted. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, 511LA.org in Louisiana, and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
